trends: There have been no other sightings in Adams
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright light the moved NW in front of us.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were heading down I81 south near Adams NY when a bright flash streaked across the sky from East to West at a very high rate of speed and we lost it in the tree tops. It was only a 6 second event, and happened very suddenly. Nothing we have ever seen before.
